Description: Painted pottery shabti of Djed-Khonsu, a Priest of Amun with a lappet-wig tied with a black fillet, a modelled face and crossed hands in relief holding black relief hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs(very worn).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore (?)
